metadata.title: USN-6006-1 -- .NET vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that .NET did not properly manage dll files. An attacker could potentially use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6006-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet7 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1 No subscription required
